original_text: When Mordecai learned all that had been done, Mordecai tore his clothes and put on sackcloth and ashes, and went out into the midst of the city, and he cried out with a loud and bitter cry.
korean_text: 모르드개가 이 모든 일을 알고 자기의 옷을 찢고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재를 뒤집어쓰고 성중에 나가서 대성 통곡하며

sentences.original_text: When Mordecai learned all that had been done
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 행해진 모든 일을 알았을 때

sentences.original_text: and put on sackcloth and ashes
and went out into the midst of the city
and he cried out with a loud and bitter cry
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 크고 통곡하는 소리로 외쳤습니다
